mapper.select: SELECT * FROM share_links WHERE id = #{id} AND is_deleted = 0
SELECT * FROM share_links WHERE share_code = #{shareCode} AND is_deleted = 0
SELECT * FROM share_links WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO share_links (user_id, file_id, share_code, password, expire_time, access_count, is_deleted, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{fileId}, #{shareCode}, #{password}, #{expireTime}, 0, 0, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE share_links SET is_deleted = 1, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{shareId}
UPDATE share_links SET access_count = access_count + 1, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{shareId}
